items.title: iPhone 18 prices may defy rising Apple costs, per analyst
items.summary:
Apple tends to be fairly consistent with its iPhone pricing, but a variety of reports have indicated that may change with the iPhone 18 line. Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo just shared his expectations, however, and it’s surprisingly good news.
more…
items.title_translated: 分析师称 iPhone 18 的价格可能会抵消苹果成本上涨的影响
items.summary_translated:
苹果的 iPhone 定价往往相当一致，但各种报告表明，iPhone 18 系列的定价可能会发生变化。然而，分析师郭明池刚刚分享了他的预期，这是一个令人惊讶的好消息。
更多的…

items.title: Apple to Keep iPhone 18 Starting Price Steady Despite Rising Memory Costs
items.summary:
DRAM shortages are set to impact smartphone manufacturers like Apple in 2026, but the company is going to try to keep iPhone 18 prices steady despite having to pay more for components, according to Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.




Kuo says that Apple negotiates memory prices with suppliers on a quart
items.title_translated: 尽管内存成本上涨，苹果仍保持 iPhone 18 起售价稳定
items.summary_translated:
苹果分析师郭明錤表示，DRAM 短缺将在 2026 年影响苹果等智能手机制造商，但该公司将努力保持 iPhone 18 的价格稳定，尽管不得不支付更多的零部件费用。




郭明池称苹果与供应商协商内存价格为一夸脱

items.summary:
Apple today seeded the third betas of upcoming iOS 26.3, iPadOS 26.3, tvOS 26.3, and watchOS 26.3 updates to public beta testers, with the updates coming a day after Apple provided the third beta to developers. 




Anyone can download and install public betas, and all that's required is to sign up

任何人都可以下载并安装公共测试版，所需要做的就是注册

items.title: iOS 26 Adoption Hits 50%, But Some Users Are Still Reluctant to Update
items.summary:
iOS 26 adoption now hovers at around 50%, according to StatCounter, but some users are still cautious about updating. 




New data published by SellCell provides a look at how users have responded to the push to update to ‌iOS 26‌. The findings are based on a January 2026 survey of 2,000 U.S.-based
items.title_translated: iOS 26 采用率达到 50%，但部分用户仍不愿更新
items.summary_translated:
根据 StatCounter 的数据，iOS 26 的采用率目前徘徊在 50% 左右，但一些用户仍然对更新持谨慎态度。 




SellCell 发布的新数据让我们了解了用户对更新至 iOS 26 的推动有何反应。该调查结果基于 2026 年 1 月对 2,000 名美国受访者进行的调查

items.title: Android 16 QPR3 lets you adjust flashlight brightness on Pixel
items.summary: Android 16 QPR3 will finally let you adjust the brightness of your Pixel’s flashlight from the Quick Settings Tile.
items.title_translated: Android 16 QPR3 可让您在 Pixel 上调整手电筒亮度
items.summary_translated: Android 16 QPR3 最终将允许您从“快速设置”磁贴调整 Pixel 手电筒的亮度。
